   contain the root `toctree` directive.

Welcome to dbt-kimball-dimensional's documentation!
===================================================

**dbt-kimball-dimensional** is an extension for the `dbt <https://docs.getdbt.com>`_ framework 
that brings `Kimball Dimensional Modeling <https://www.kimballgroup.com/data-warehouse-business-intelligence-resources/kimball-techniques/dimensional-modeling-techniques/>`_ 
into the dbt ecosystem.


.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 2
   :caption: Contents:
   
   fact_strategies
